GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
i2c: Fix a potential use after free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 12b0606000d0828630c033bf0c74c748464fe87d, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 611e12ea0f121a31d9e9c4ce2a18a77abc2f28d6. For more details please see the references link.
